website_summaries.verdict: A quality pressed powder by a brand that's been trusted for generations. Available in lots of shades and works well for most users.
pros: Sets itself apart by offering a choice of 16 shades, so finding one to match your skin tone shouldn't be an issue
Delivers a soft matte finish and controls oil
Made without parabens, fragrance, and mineral oil
cons: May require frequent touch-ups, especially if your skin is very oily

customer_reviews.title: Buyers' Gamble
customer_reviews.text: So... I generally like the product, even though it takes an almost yellow tinge as the day goes on.. it does wonders to keep shine down and feels light..... But this arrived broken. Like, maybe not smashed to pieces like some of the others said, but a chunk was missing. So other buyers- feel free to take the gamble if you want! Mine still works, but that was annoying. And seller- maybe think of packaging them in smaller boxes with more cushion? Cuz this was just rattling around in like an 1A5 and a half-popped air-bubble thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, just expect different packaging than the photo
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because of the slightly cheaper price than the new round ones sold at clinique.com and in beauty stores, plus I like the old square compact packaging pictured. Please be aware that in my order they substituted the new round ones, so the photo is not accurate, but the packaging says it contains the same 0.27oz quantity of product.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: I loved this powder when I lived on the humid east ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this powder when I lived on the humid east coast. I have oily skin and wore just this powder when I didn't want to put on full foundation and it did a great job of balancing me out. Since I've lived in dry California, though, this powder just sits on my skin and looks dry.
customer_reviews.author: MHDA

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive the compact shown. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the compact shown. It was round and in a mirrored compact. I didn't know clinique changed their casing for the compact.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Best powder ever!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best powder I’ve ever used!!! It covers but you can’t see the powder on my face!!! It’s not cakes or dry looking. Fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Kelly C Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday!
customer_reviews.text: This is my “go to” foundation. Other than Clinique themselves making the product smaller and the package bigger I have no complaints about the product.
customer_reviews.author: contraltoval

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Clinique has such a beautiful case though the fingerprints annoy me. This is my favorite powder from all the ones I’ve ever tried. I use the invisible because I’m fair to medium and it seems to adjust to my shades when I get a bit of tan. It doesn’t look cakey and doesn’t have a strong smell. I find the price is usually better here better than at Ulta or Clinique.
customer_reviews.author: S. P. Irving

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful face powder
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. I like purchasing it on Amazon because it saves me travel and time. It covers my face smoothly and the lack of shine last from early morning to bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Clinique stay-matte makeup is my favorite, and I've tried them all. I use this powder in combo with the foundation, and the look is flawless and natural. This powder is not too heavy, and the coverage is buildable. Great stuff by far.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta Fox

customer_reviews.title: Clinique?
customer_reviews.text: Looked great when I received it, but noticed very quickly it did not feel smooth like the last Clinique presses powder I had. It started cracking within the first few days of use, then pretty much broke into chalky pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Reel

customer_reviews.title: The picture of the product is not what I got
customer_reviews.text: I did not get exactly what I ordered. But I ran out of my makeup so it’s why I kept it and used it. I have used the product for awhile now and it is definitely not the same as what I’m used to using for the Clinique pressed matte powder. The product does not work as it should. I was supposed to get a green square shaped Clinique pressed matte powder but for some reason I got a round shaped silver/metal pressed powder. Definitely not the same product! I’m concerned about ordering again hoping I will get what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Skijump

customer_reviews.title: face powder
customer_reviews.text: I liked the case powder was in, but its not the usual green case and the powder was different made my face super oily
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Wrong colour - double check upon receipt!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the wrong colour - ordered number 03 stay beige and received 02 matte beige. My fault for not checking when I received it and only noticing today, when I opened the first one to use, so I missed refund/exchange deadlines. Nevertheless, it’s very disappointing to be stuck with 3 units of the wrong product!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Iasbec Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Covers great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coverage to use if you don't want to use a base. Lightweight and covers great!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Old, unusable product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my mother in law. Both were clearly old packaging and very old product. They are unusable, hard and bubbled. I would love to return them but there is no email to inquire. My mother in law just opened them after using the last of her previous product so the two week return window has passed. Now she is stuck with two useless products.
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: Soft matte finish.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely matte finish. I am happy with this product especially because I have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Old soul

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this for years. Put on with big make up brush. Does crack easily when you get low. Covers good, last good
customer_reviews.author: fisherc826

customer_reviews.title: Same makeup in a newer case
customer_reviews.text: Although they changed the case from the old green case, this is the same quality makeup with the same excellent results.
customer_reviews.author: Doglover

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I opened this product. Touched it with a small make up brush and the compacted powder crumbled. I believe it was an old product or defective. The same powder is in a different case in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Porter

customer_reviews.title: Terrific powder for light cover and blending
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this makeup and was so happy to find it on line.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice face powder.
customer_reviews.text: This can be bought at department store for the same price.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: Came in different packaging shown. Was made well. Nice shade match
customer_reviews.author: Marina Ruybal

customer_reviews.title: but it's better for my skin than my other foundation
customer_reviews.text: It makes my skin look very dry, but it's better for my skin than my other foundation. This may be because it's lighter than I expected. I wouldn't recommend buying makeup online unless you know exactly what colour you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: ShamsFam

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was cheaper, or with deals
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but it’s expensive. I not always can purchase it

customer_reviews.title: Came in great shape
customer_reviews.text: I only use clinique makeup. This one was well packaged and got here quickly. I couldn't be happier with it

customer_reviews.text: Wonderful value for this awesome product. Thank you so much.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Item Not As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted the item pictured, which features the higher quality green case that has been discontinued. Instead, I got something different. Bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: We are a family of people with sensitive skin. Many cosmetics that are described as for sensitive skin still cause a reaction. This powder does not. There are a variety of shades. The coverage is great. The case is attractive.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, I love this stuff. I’ve used the sheer powder before but I like that this one adds just a little bit of color

customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS COMPACT GIVES YOU A SMOOTH FINISH AND ACTUALLY BLURS YOUR WRINKLES AND FINE LINES

customer_reviews.text: This powder provides nice coverage without appearing heavy or flaky.I have used this product for some time and plan on to stay a loyal customer.

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even look like I'm putting it on- coverage is very minimal and I'm shiney within 10 minutes. using this you would need to reapply several times a day

customer_reviews.text: The face powder has traces of moisture in the contents. Otherwise it's fine with me.

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Clinique Stay Matte Sheer Pressed Powder - Invisible Matte
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear foundation. I do have sun damaged skin (freckles and sun spots). I don't like trying to match my skin color to colored powder that cannot be opened before buying the powder. Too risky. I read that colorless translucent powder was just the thing for powdering a shiny nose. I hope it works.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Face Powder
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this face powder for 10 years. I find the oil free powder wonderful, as it remains on the face all day long. It has a lovely natural look, and the handy compact with mirror is a real bonus, and fits so well into a small make-up bag.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only purchase Clinique powder and BB cream for my face!!

customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me daughter, but I tried it out so I could write a review. I am quite impressed with it. I used a brush, rather than the provided sponge and the coverage was great. I normally use a loose mineral powder, but this worked even better and gave a nice even tone without looking caked on.

customer_reviews.title: Broken into a million pieces

I bought once and all was well, bought the second time and it arrived completely unusable. If it had been intended to be a loose powder, it would have been great, but as a pressed powder, I can't do anything with it. Seriously money down the drain. I know that's the risk you take, buying make-up online, but I'm really disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: I order 2 #02 Stay Neutral and it came one number #3 and one #2 and now i'm stuck with it, this is the only reason i'm givin it a single star rate.
customer_reviews.author: Eespinetti

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite powder to use ever, I've been using it for years and years. I first use dr jart silver bb cream to start as a base, then finish it with Clinique Stay Matte Sheer Powder in Stay Cream. It stays on all day, looks natural, and I *knock on wood* rarely get pimples (once every few months maybe. Before with other brands I would break out constantly from the formula) using this combination. If you have kind of oily skin like me and your skin is a bit sensitive, I recommend trying this out in your shade.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha linden

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what is going on with this powder, ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is going on with this powder, but the minute I opened it, the powder cracked. Pieces of it break off each time I run the powder brush over it to use. Have had it 3 days. Initiated refund, but not sure it’ll be honored considering the breaks in the powder. It could be it is too old a product, cause I doubt Clinique would allow this quality to happen with new product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Soto

customer_reviews.title: Nice neutral facial powder.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Clinique. I love this powder - it's easy to apply and I usually brush it over my moisturizer and go. I use my make up brush, but the sponge applicator that comes with the powder works fine too. It is not quite transparent, but it is sheer. Matte, not shimmery.
customer_reviews.author: Des A.

customer_reviews.title: The powder is great - I only gave this 3 stars because the ...
customer_reviews.text: The powder is great - I only gave this 3 stars because the powder cake started to crumble and pieces break off within a week, despite it having been sent well wrapped up in the packaging. Today I had to throw it out because it had completely crumbled. Only had it a couple of weeks. Waste of money. Recommend only buying from the Clinique site.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Karagosian

product_meta.title: Clinique Stay-Matte Sheer Pressed Powder, 02 Stay Neutral, 0.27 Ounce
product_meta.description:
Color:02 Stay NeutralStay-Matte Sheer Pressed Powder
Shine-absorbing, oil-free formula. Ultra-sheer texture gives skin a perfected matte appearance. Great for oily skin and oily spots. Maintains a fresh look and feel, even after frequent touch-ups. 


Skin Types: 2 - Dry Combination, 3 - Oily, 4 - Very Oily
Formula: Pressed powder
Coverage: Sheer to Moderate
Benefits: Oil control, Mineral enriched
feature_bullets: This powder foundation helps create a natural complexion
Reduces excess oil and shine without mixing up makeup
Gives you a flawless matte look
